goals__remit:
Company Profile 
 
TruTac are a software house with extensive experience in all logistics software. We are one of the UK’s largest and most successful tachograph analysis companies. We design and deliver software solutions for all fleet sizes and sectors; we make managing compliance easier, saving time, money and adding value. 
 
Services 
Compliance and operations solutions 
Software and bespoke development 
Hardware and stationery products 
Tachograph analysis bureau 
Training and Consultancy
